mapper.insert: insert into basic_spacetype (pkid, name, sortnum, createtime, remark,unitid) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update basic_spacetype set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, unitid = #{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, name, sortnum, createtime, remark,unitid from basic_spacetype
